entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT: improve getExactClasses to support classes as base types #88547
  • Integrating .NET 8 WebAssembly project into the Angular app #88545

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add IEnumerable<T>.ToReadOnlyList() and ToReadOnlyCollection() extension methods #88018
  • Full GC starts every 24 hours after system starting #88035
  • Missing CI test coverage for Vector512 #88233
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Move startup validation to the options assembly #88546
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Convert RuntimeHelpers intrinsics to JIT ones #88543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Improve `crossgen2 --help` layout #88544
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono][RISC-V] emit mul inst instead of emulated mul #85445
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Have jitstress_isas_x86_evex set PreferredVectorBitWidth=512 #88531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [RISC-V, LOONGARCH64] Fix FuncEvalHijack stack allocation #88493
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [interp] Add MINT_STELEM_VT_NOREF #87161
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2217148 #88506
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Read/Write Big/LittleEndian support for Guid #87993
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Poolable / Resettable CBOR Readers #88104
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Rewrite DbBuffer Read/Write methods with stackalloc #88395
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize const ShiftRightLogical for byte values on XArch #86841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Combine writes in `WidenAsciiToUtf16` #88502
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: experimental changes to redundant branch opts #88527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add public MethodInvoker and ConstructorInvoker classes #88415
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fixes #82871 Add an additional constructor for StackTrace #88542
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use optimized Index.GetOffset in Range.GetOffsetAndLength #87317
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [TEST] http metrics sandbox #88530
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Ensure that NI_Vector_Dot is always handled as TYP_SIMD #88447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] source-build: don't skip building Native Aot artifacts. #88520
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717
    area-Host
  • RemoveDirectoryRecursive: fix delete of mount points #86918
    area-System.IO, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
